Text.Page:
This is the place where the very first commander Maknakh was sighted. The Commanders disappeared a long time ago thanks to the guardians, but there have been reports of unnerving earthquakes and loud explosions here. Could you please investigate this place?

You can move to the "Commanderâ€™s Residence" by talking to me.

- The Commander will awake when a raid group of 20 players enters this dungeon.

Adventure Coins and Entry count required.
